name: User Login
backend_requirements: User model: id, username (unique), password_hash, created_at
POST /api/auth/register - hash password with bcrypt, return success/error
POST /api/auth/login - verify credentials, return JWT token
GET /api/auth/me - return current user info from token
frontend_requirements: Login form with username and password fields
Registration form with username, password, confirm password
Show error messages for invalid credentials
